text: Allah ne un logon ka qaul suna jo kehte hain ke Allah fakeer hai aur hum gani hain. Unki yeh baatein bhi hum likh lenge, aur issey pehle jo woh paigambaron ko na-haqq qatal karte rahey hain woh bhi unke naam e aamaal mein sabt hai (jab faisle ka waqt aayega us waqt) hum unse kahenge ke lo ab azaab e jahannum ka maza chakkho
